resources.string: You may use these options to control intensity of audio between recorded video and (optional) chosen song.

1. When you receive likes and love on HowFar-LIKE section, you immediately earn a equivalent amount of HF cent, 2 cents for a like and 4 cents for Love.

 2.You can convert HF coin to your local cash.

 3. HF coin balance Available+Withdrawing.

 4. 250 HFCent equals 1 HFCoin
